price: 20. Waxaana ka magan galay Rabbigay iyo Rabbigiin inaad i dhagaxyeysaan7
arabic: وَإِنِّي عُذۡتُ بِرَبِّي وَرَبِّكُمۡ أَن تَرۡجُمُونِ
footnotes: 7. Si aydaan dhagax iigu shiidin ilaa geeri. Ama si aydaan iigu dhaleeceyn carrabyadiinna ama si aydaan iigu dhibaateyn si kale.

version.title: Somali translation - Jacob
version.description: Translation of the meanings of the Noble Qur'an into the Somali language, translated by Abdullah Hasan Jacob.

meta.transliteration: wa-innī ʿudh'tu birabbī warabbikum an tarjumūni
